result.eng: Did I give you enough food?
result.ga: ar thug mé dóthain bia duit
result.orig: ar thug mé dóthain bia duit
result.html: ar thug mé dóthain bia duitDid I give you enough food?
result.ponchtml: ar ṫug mé dóṫain bia duitDid I give you enough food?

result.eng: Give me a drop of water please.
result.ga: tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.orig: tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.html: tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoilGive me a drop of water please.
result.ponchtml: taḃair dom braon uisce le do ṫoilGive me a drop of water please.

result.eng: He forced her to give up the child.
result.ga: chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.orig: chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.html: chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithiHe forced her to give up the child.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé iaċall uirṫi an páiste a ṫaḃairt uaiṫiHe forced her to give up the child.

result.eng: We want healthy people to give blood.
result.ga: is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú fola
result.orig: is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú fola
result.html: is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú folaWe want healthy people to give blood.
result.ponchtml: is mian linn go mbeaḋ daoine sláintiúla ag deonú folaWe want healthy people to give blood.

result.eng: He doesn't have the authority to give orders.
result.ga: níl an t-údarás aige orduithe a thabhairt
result.orig: níl an t-údarás aige orduithe a thabhairt
result.html: níl an t-údarás aige orduithe a thabhairtHe doesn't have the authority to give orders.
result.ponchtml: níl an t-údarás aige orduiṫe a ṫaḃairtHe doesn't have the authority to give orders.

result.ga: tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoil
result.orig: tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoil
result.html: tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoilGive me the book please.
result.ponchtml: taḃair dom an leaḃar le do ṫoilGive me the book please.

result.eng: We will give you all the data.
result.ga: tabharfaidh muid na sonraí uilig duit
result.orig: tabharfaidh muid na sonraí uilig duit
result.html: tabharfaidh muid na sonraí uilig duitWe will give you all the data.
result.ponchtml: taḃarfaiḋ muid na sonraí uilig duitWe will give you all the data.

result.eng: Doctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ga: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.orig: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.html: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ponchtml: tugann doċtúirí cógas dóiḃ a ṫugann faoiseaṁ dóiḃ aċ naċ leiġeasann iadDoctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.

result.eng: They give advice to girls who are expecting a child.
result.ga: tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páiste
result.orig: tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páiste
result.html: tugann siad comhairle do chailíní a bhíonn ag súil le páisteThey give advice to girls who are expecting a child.
result.ponchtml: tugann siad coṁairle do ċailíní a ḃíonn ag súil le páisteThey give advice to girls who are expecting a child.

result.eng: You can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ga: is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.orig: is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.html: is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ponchtml: is féidir leat cúnaṁ a ṫaḃairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an daṫ ceart a roġnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.

result.eng: Give me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.
result.ga: tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a mhama
result.orig: tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a mhama
result.html: tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a mhamaGive me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.
result.ponchtml: taḃair gloine sú oráiste dom a ṁamaGive me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.

result.eng: Give us two notebooks and two pencils, please.
result.ga: tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoil
result.orig: tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoil

result.eng: If you behave well, I will give you a surprise.
result.ga: má tá tú go maith tabharfaidh mé surprise chugat
result.orig: má tá tú go maith tabharfaidh mé surprise chugat
result.html: má tá tú go maith tabharfaidh mé surprise chugatIf you behave well, I will give you a surprise.
result.ponchtml: má tá tú go maiṫ taḃarfaiḋ mé surprise ċugatIf you behave well, I will give you a surprise.

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.html: ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibhIt was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ponchtml: ba ċloíte an ṁaise dom é gan coṁairle a ṫaḃairt daoiḃIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ga: tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.orig: tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochta
result.html: tugann scaoilteacht an idirlín ardán d'achan chineál cancráin a bheith ag caitheamh anuas ar dhaoine eile faoi sciath na ganfhiosaíochtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
result.ponchtml: tugann scaoilteaċt an idirlín ardán d'aċan ċineál cancráin a ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ anuas ar ḋaoine eile faoi sciaṫ na ganḟiosaíoċtaThe relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.
